Low bone density also tends to occur late in CF. It can lead to bone-thinning disorders called osteoporosis and osteopenia.",NHLBI,Cystic Fibrosis
How to diagnose Cystic Fibrosis ?,"Doctors diagnose cystic fibrosis (CF) based on the results from various tests.
